tool_description: Detects speech segments in audio streams, distinguishing between speech and silence to optimize transcription processing and reduce computational overhead.

min_silence_duration_ms.description: Minimum silence duration to split segments (100-2000 ms)

error_messages: Invalid audio chunk: Provide a valid audio_chunk_id.
Invalid sensitivity: Sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid speech duration: min_speech_duration_ms must be between 50-500 milliseconds.
Invalid silence duration: min_silence_duration_ms must be between 100-2000 milliseconds.
usage: Provide audio_chunk_id for analysis. Configure sensitivity and minimum durations as needed. Returns speech activity detection results with segment boundaries.

has_speech.description: Whether speech was detected in the chunk

speech_segments.description: List of detected speech segment identifiers

total_speech_duration_ms.description: Total duration of speech in the chunk
